page.title: 03THE DOWER HOUSE
page.content: THE DOWER HOUSE IS SET IN THE MANOR ESTATE WHICH IS THE "QUIET" PART OF WOODHALL.THIS HOTEL ACCOMMODATES 14 PEOPLE.THERE ARE 7 ROOMS AND 4 OF THESE HAVE BATHROOMS.ALSO THERE IS A BAR WHICH IS VERY SUCCESSFUL.MOST PEOPLE STAY FOR BED AND BREAKFAST AND THEY ARE USUALLY EITHER GOLFERS OR BUSINESSMEN.THE DOWER HOUSE HOTEL MUST OWN A LICENCE TO SELL DRINK, AND HAVE SAFETY PRECAUTIONS.THE HOTEL HAS 2 DINING ROOMS AND EMPLOYS 3 PEOPLE WHO WORK IN THE KITCHENS 1 IS A WAITER WHILE THE OTHER 2 CLEAN. THE DOWER HOUSE MAINTAINS A HIGH STANDARD OF HOSPITALITY.
